nodes.title: SSCMS
nodes.summary: 基于微软 .NET Core 平台的多站点 CMS

product.summary: WordPress is open source software you can use to create a beautiful website, blog, or app
A simple but powerful control panel

面向全球用户的论坛系统
基于微软 .NET Core 平台的多站点 CMS
Open Source video conferencing platforms with state-of-the-art video quality and features.
基于微软 .NET Core 平台的多站点 CMS

overview.overview: SSCMS 是一款跨平台、可分布式部署的产品，产品能够运行在各类操作系统之上，同时支持 MySql、SqlServer、PostgreSql、SQLite 以及国产达梦数据库。

highlights: SSCMS 能够在一个平台上管理成百上千个网站
拥有国家部委、上市公司、大型事业单位等重量级客户

childMarkdownRemark.html: SSCMS, also known as Site Server CMS, is a content management system. It enables users to build, maintain and operate their websites through simple website management and efficient webpage generation technology. SSCMS is easy to use, powerful, efficient and stable, suitable for enterprises and organizations of all sizes. Through SSCMS, users can easily manage website content, layout and functions to meet changing market needs. At the same time, SSCMS provides a series of advanced features such as multi-language support, SEO optimization, access statistics, etc., to help users improve website performance and user experience.
